ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.AppModel
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.Item

  • public class Item
extends AppModel
    The Item class is an sub-class of AppModel. The class allows the user to call ClaimantAddItemController to create a new item, set up and edit item detail(including date, category, description and amount), call receipt class to create a receipt.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    Date

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method translates date from Date object to string object. It also translates receipt from Receipt object to String object. Then combines date, category, description, receipt and flag all together into one big String. It will be operate when the program need the Item detail to display.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        "" a String object combine with many small String variable
